update.description:
Language updates.
Use utf-8 when sending system email (traffic warning etc.).
Fix logging of console logons in Login/Logout section.
Fix Pulsar DSL.
Fix SF bug #3403666, firewall timeframe rules.
Fix timestamp on rrdtool.
Fix USB modeswitch for 3G flip-flop modems.
Upgrade apache httpd to 2.2.21, coreutils to 8.13, squid to 3.1.15, tzadata-2011j, usb-modeswitch-data to 20110805
Upgrade usb-modeswitch to 1.1.9 and add jimsh mini-tcl
